subject: Just posted a evpmaker file
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I experimented today with EVP assistant as a backdrop to my session 
with EVP maker.  The file i just posted was from using white noise in 
the background from that program along with a regular allophone 
session.  If anybody wants to experiment with different sounds in the 
background, you can download that program too.  

More Freeware:

http://www.evpuk.com/evp_assistant_software.html

-Steve H.
